A

avg(String) - Method in CalculationDelegate
Returns the average value for the metric in the given timerange calculated by taking the sum of average values and dividing it by the number of values.

N

O

P

percentage(String, double) - Method in CalculationDelegate
Returns value representing percentage of metric value in given timerange
If min, max or sum values exist for metric provided then these are used as base value for percentage calculation (minimum of min values or maximum of max values or sum of sum values).
